title: At a Touch Tank
description: This book describes the types of animals that live in an Alaskan coast touch tank. Students will have the opportunity to compare and contrast invertebrates that live along the coast of Alaska.
reviewWords: Alaska, anemones, gently, sea cucumber, tentacles, touch tank
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast
phonics: Consonant Digraphs                : Discriminate initial and final consonant digraph sh
wordWork: High-Frequency Words                : Recognize and use high-frequency word this
